name: Mini Zoo Craft
description:
Mini zoo craft, create your own zoo, you will be able to craft as many as dozens of different animals.
There are many small venues in this zoo, and you can also create your own animal venues.
There are shark whales in the aquarium
There is a lion tiger zebra leopard inside the beast
There are swan ducks and other birds in the bird museum.
There is also a restaurant and a watchtower in the middle of the zoo!
Mini zoo craft features:
1. HD 3D sandbox game
2. A grand mini world map
3. You can create anything you want
4. Flight mode allows you to reach every corner of the world quickly

If you like the mini zoo craft, please share it to your friends, thank you!
